title: Candy Crush Saga v1 15 1 Unlimited Life No Ticket incl Move Mods
description:
Candy Crush Saga v1.15.1 Unlimited Life No ticket Android

NO ROOT NEEDED
Candy Crush Saga
Version: 1.15.1
Google Play Link : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.king.candycrushsaga&hl=en

Version 1
Unlimited life (5 is displayed on screen)
No tic ket
Up to level 395

Version 2
Normal moves + 30 moves
+30 seconds time limit
Bomb time is equal to the # of moves
Unlimited life (5 is displayed on screen)
No tic ket
Up to level 395

Version 3.0
150 moves
4-colored-candy
Bomb time is equal to the # of moves
Game Mode : classic and Classic moves
-normal moves but 3-colored-candy
4 minutes time limit - 4-colored-candy
Unlimited life (5 is displayed on screen)
No tic ket
Up to level 395

Version 3.1
150 moves
Regular-colored-candy
Bomb time is equal to the # of moves
4 minutes time limit
Unlimited life (5 is displayed on screen)
No tic ket
Up to level 395

Version 4
1000 moves
4-colored-candy
Bomb time is equal to the # of moves
Game Mode : classic and Classic moves
-normal moves but 3-colored-candy
10 minutes time limit - 4-colored-candy
Unlimited life (5 is displayed on screen)
No tic ket
Up to level 395

Installation instruction:

1. Make sure to sync your Candy Crush's latest progress to your facebook account.
-if your unable to do this, I'm not responsible for loss of your game progress
2. Uninstall your current Candy Crush app.
3. If you have the Facebook app, uninstall it for now (this process is important) but if you don't have the Facebook app proceed to step 4.
-Pre-installed Facebook app, go to app's seettings and disable facebook
4. Download your preferred Candy Crush version
5. Once downloaded, install the app and after that, open the app right away.
6. Once opened, you should see PLAY and CONNECT buttons, you need to tap the CONNECT button and then log in to your Facebook account.
7. You should be able to sync and play.
8. If you had uninstalled your Facebook app, you can install it again
9. Say thanks or give credits to me of course hehe
10. Lastly, most important, Enjoy!

FAQ's

I can't install the modded CC
-uninstall your current CC app, and then install the modded CC
-if still can't install, redownload Modded CC, uninstall Current CC, restart Phone, Install Modded CC

I can't sync to Facebook
-uninstall your Facebook App, then open CC and then re-sync

Would my progress erased and need to start from level 1 if I will use your Modded CC?
-NO, if you followed the steps correctly

** Includes Candy Crush Saga v1.15.1 Unlimited Life No Ticket and 30,150,1000 move mods
